languages.text: "Моими руками да покарает Бог-Император и предателя-еретика, и нечистого ксеноса!"

traits.locale_text: "Моими руками да покарает Бог-Император и предателя-еретика, и нечистого ксеноса!"

languages.text: "May the God-Emperor guide my hand when I bring punishment upon the traitorous heretic and the unholy xenos!"
languages.original_text: "Моими руками да покарает Бог-Император и предателя-еретика, и нечистого ксеноса!"

traits.locale_text: "May the God-Emperor guide my hand when I bring punishment upon the traitorous heretic and the unholy xenos!"
"May the God-Emperor guide my hand when I bring punishment upon the traitorous heretic and the unholy xenos!"
"May the God-Emperor guide my hand when I bring punishment upon the traitorous heretic and the unholy xenos!"
"May the God-Emperor guide my hand when I bring punishment upon the traitorous heretic and the unholy xenos!"
"May the God-Emperor guide my hand when I bring punishment upon the traitorous heretic and the unholy xenos!"
"May the God-Emperor guide my hand when I bring punishment upon the traitorous heretic and the unholy xenos!"

languages.text: « Puisse l'Empereur-Dieu guider mon bras lorsque j'infligerai un juste châtiment au traître hérétique et au xénos impie ! »
languages.original_text: "May the God-Emperor guide my hand when I bring punishment upon the traitorous heretic and the unholy xenos!"

traits.locale_text: « Puisse l'Empereur-Dieu guider mon bras lorsque j'infligerai un juste châtiment au traître hérétique et au xénos impie ! »

languages.text: “愿神皇指引我，让我惩罚两面三刀的异端分子和无法无天的异形！”
languages.original_text: "May the God-Emperor guide my hand when I bring punishment upon the traitorous heretic and the unholy xenos!"

traits.locale_text: “愿神皇指引我，让我惩罚两面三刀的异端分子和无法无天的异形！”

languages.text: 「裏切り者の異端者と不浄の異種族に罰を下すにあたり、神帝陛下のお導きがあらんことを！」
languages.original_text: "May the God-Emperor guide my hand when I bring punishment upon the traitorous heretic and the unholy xenos!"

traits.locale_text: 「裏切り者の異端者と不浄の異種族に罰を下すにあたり、神帝陛下のお導きがあらんことを！」

languages.text: "Möge der Gottimperator meine Hand führen, wenn ich den verräterischen Ketzer und den unheiligen Xenos bestrafen werde!"
languages.original_text: "May the God-Emperor guide my hand when I bring punishment upon the traitorous heretic and the unholy xenos!"

traits.locale_text: "Möge der Gottimperator meine Hand führen, wenn ich den verräterischen Ketzer und den unheiligen Xenos bestrafen werde!"

languages.text: «¡Que el Dios Emperador guíe mi mano cuando castigue a este hereje traidor y a su impío xenos!».
languages.original_text: "May the God-Emperor guide my hand when I bring punishment upon the traitorous heretic and the unholy xenos!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Que el Dios Emperador guíe mi mano cuando castigue a este hereje traidor y a su impío xenos!».

languages.text: "Bu hain kâfirle dinsiz zenonun cezasını vereceğim vakit Tanrı İmparator bana güç versin!"
languages.original_text: "May the God-Emperor guide my hand when I bring punishment upon the traitorous heretic and the unholy xenos!"

traits.locale_text: "Bu hain kâfirle dinsiz zenonun cezasını verdiğimde Tanrı İmparator bana güç versin!"
